en: “‘It is also my custom,’ said he, smiling in the most pleasant fashion until his eyes were just two little shining slits amid the white creases of his face, ‘to advance to my young ladies half their salary beforehand, so that they may meet any little expenses of their journey and their wardrobe.’
vi: ‘Tôi còn có thói quen,’ ông ta nói và cười vui vẻ đến mức hai mắt chỉ còn là hai đường kẻ nhỏ lấp lánh giữa những nếp nhăn trên khuôn mặt, ‘luôn ứng trước cho các cô gái trẻ phân nửa tiền lương, như thế họ có thể trang trải vài món chi phí nhỏ về việc đi lại và mua ít quần áo mới.’
tr: " 'Ayrıca,' dedi, - gülümsediğinde gözleri yüzünün beyaz kırışıklarının arasında parıldıyordu - 'genç bayanlarıma maaşlarının yarısını önceden veririm ki, seyahatleri ve gardıropları için gerekli harcamaları yapabilsinler.'
es: "También es mi costumbre -dijo, sonriendo de la manera más agradable hasta que sus ojos eran sólo dos pequeñas rendijas brillantes en medio de las blancas arrugas de su rostro- adelantar a mis jóvenes la mitad de su salario por adelantado, para que puedan hacer frente a los pequeños gastos de su viaje y su vestuario.
vi_translation: ‘I also have a habit,’ he said, laughing so heartily that his eyes became mere sparkling slits amidst the wrinkles on his face, ‘of always advancing half the salary to young girls, so they can cover some small expenses for travel and buy a few new clothes.’
tr_translation: " 'Additionally,' he said, - when he smiled, his eyes sparkled among the white wrinkles of his face - 'I give my young ladies half of their salary in advance so that they can make the necessary expenses for their travel and wardrobe.'
es_translation: "It is also my custom," he said, smiling in the most pleasant manner until his eyes were just two small shining slits amidst the white wrinkles of his face, "to advance my young men half of their salary in advance, so that they can cover the small expenses of their journey and their clothing.

en: “‘I am afraid that it is quite essential,’ said he. ‘It is a little fancy of my wife’s, and ladies’ fancies, you know, madam, ladies’ fancies must be consulted. And so you won’t cut your hair?’
vi: ‘Tôi e rằng điều này khá quan trọng,’ ông ta nói. ‘Đó là một sở thích nho nhỏ của vợ tôi, mà những sở thích của phụ nữ thì cô cũng biết rồi đấy, ta buộc phải nghe theo thôi. Vậy là, cô không chịu cắt tóc phải không?
tr: " 'Ama ne yazık ki bunu yapmanız şart,' dedi. 'Bu, karımın küçük bir hayali ve siz de bilirsiniz ki bayanların istekleri yerine getirilmelidir. Siz gerçekten saçlarınızı kestirmemekte kararlı mısınız?
es: "Me temo que es esencial -dijo-. Es un pequeño capricho de mi esposa, y los caprichos de las damas, ya sabe, señora, los caprichos de las damas deben ser consultados. Entonces, ¿no se cortará el pelo?
vi_translation: ‘I’m afraid this is quite important,’ he said. ‘It’s a little hobby of my wife’s, and as you know, with women’s hobbies, you just have to go along with them. So, you refuse to cut your hair, don’t you?’
tr_translation: " 'But unfortunately, you must do this,' he said. 'This is a small dream of my wife, and you know that ladies' wishes must be fulfilled. Are you really determined not to cut your hair?'
es_translation: "I'm afraid it's essential," he said. "It's a little whim of my wife, and the whims of ladies, you know, madam, the whims of ladies must be consulted." "So, you won't cut your hair?"

en: “Please be at the Black Swan Hotel at Winchester at midday to-morrow,” it said. “Do come! I am at my wit’s end.
vi: Vui lòng có mặt ở khách sạn Black Swan tại Winchester lúc trưa mai.
tr: Lütfen yarın öğle vakti Winchester'daki Black Swan Oteli'nde olun. Lütfen gelin! Çıldırmak üzereyim.
es: "Por favor, esté en el Hotel Black Swan de Winchester mañana a mediodía", decía. "¡Venga! Estoy al límite de mis fuerzas.
vi_translation: Please be at the Black Swan Hotel in Winchester by noon tomorrow. Please come! I don't know how to manage.
tr_translation: Please be at the Black Swan Hotel in Winchester tomorrow at noon. Please come! I'm about to go crazy.
es_translation: "Please be at the Black Swan Hotel in Winchester tomorrow at noon," it said. "Come! I am at the end of my strength."

en: “Two days later this same performance was gone through under exactly similar circumstances. Again I changed my dress, again I sat in the window, and again I laughed very heartily at the funny stories of which my employer had an immense répertoire, and which he told inimitably. Then he handed me a yellow-backed novel, and moving my chair a little sideways, that my own shadow might not fall upon the page, he begged me to read aloud to him. I read for about ten minutes, beginning in the heart of a chapter, and then suddenly, in the middle of a sentence, he ordered me to cease and to change my dress.
vi: Hai ngày sau, cảnh đó lại tái diễn cũng trong tình huống giống hệt như thế. Một lần nữa, tôi lại thay áo, lại ngôi bên cửa sổ và ôm bụng cười rũ rượi khi nghe cả một kho chuyện hài hước mà ông chủ tôi kể với phong cách độc đáo không sao bắt chước được. Sau đó, ông ta trao cho tôi một quyển truyện có bìa màu vàng và dời cái ghế của tôi sang bên cạnh một chút để trang giấy không bị sấp bóng của chính tôi, rồi yêu cầu tôi đọc to lên cho ông ta nghe. Tôi đọc được độ mười phút, bắt đầu vào giữa chương thì đột nhiên ông ta ngắt lời tôi, bảo tôi ngừng lại và thay áo.
tr: " İki gün sonra, aynı sahne benzer şartlar altında tekrarlandı. Yine elbisemi giydim, pencerenin önüne oturdum ve patronumun bitmek tükenmek bilmeyen hikâyelerine gülüp durdum. Sonra elime bir roman tutuşturdu, sandalyeyi, sayfanın üstüne gölgem düşmeyecek şekilde ayarladı ve yüksek sesle okumamı istedi. On dakika kadar okuduktan sonra - tam da ilk bölümün ortasına gelmiştim -cümleyi dahi bitiremeden durmamı ve yukarı çıkarak elbisemi değiştirmemi emretti.
es: "Dos días más tarde, esta misma actuación se llevó a cabo en circunstancias exactamente similares. Volví a cambiarme de vestido, volví a sentarme en la ventana y volví a reírme a carcajadas de las divertidas historias de las que mi patrón disponía de un inmenso repertorio y que contaba de forma inimitable. Luego me entregó una novela de lomo amarillo, y moviendo mi silla un poco hacia un lado, para que mi propia sombra no cayera sobre la página, me rogó que le leyera en voz alta. Leí durante unos diez minutos, comenzando en el corazón de un capítulo, y de repente, en medio de una frase, me ordenó que cesara y que me cambiara de vestido.
vi_translation: Two days later, that scene repeated itself in exactly the same situation. Once again, I changed clothes, sat by the window, and laughed uncontrollably while listening to a whole trove of humorous stories that my boss told with an inimitable style. After that, he handed me a book with a yellow cover and moved my chair slightly to the side so that the pages wouldn't be shadowed by my own shadow, then asked me to read aloud to him. I read for about ten minutes, starting in the middle of a chapter, when he suddenly interrupted me, told me to stop, and change clothes.
tr_translation: " Two days later, the same scene was repeated under similar conditions. Again, I put on my dress, sat in front of the window, and laughed at my employer's endless stories. Then he handed me a novel, adjusted the chair so that my shadow wouldn't fall on the page, and asked me to read aloud. After reading for about ten minutes - I was right in the middle of the first chapter - he ordered me to stop, without even finishing the sentence, and go upstairs to change my dress.
es_translation: "Two days later, this same performance was carried out under exactly similar circumstances. I changed my dress again, sat by the window again, and laughed heartily at the amusing stories of which my employer had an immense repertoire and told in an inimitable manner. Then he handed me a yellow-spined novel, and moving my chair slightly to the side so that my own shadow would not fall on the page, he asked me to read aloud to him. I read for about ten minutes, starting in the middle of a chapter, and suddenly, in the middle of a sentence, he ordered me to stop and change my dress.

en: “We must be circumspect, for we are dealing with a very cunning man. We can do nothing until seven o’clock. At that hour we shall be with you, and it will not be long before we solve the mystery.”
vi: “Chúng ta phải thận trọng vì ta đang đối phó với một con người hết sức xảo quyệt. Từ giờ cho đến 7 giờ thì ta không thể làm gì được. Đến đúng thời điểm đó, chúng tôi sẽ đến trang viên gặp cô và chẳng mấy chốc ta sẽ giải quyết được vấn đề.”
tr: " İhtiyatlı olmalıyız, çünkü karşımızda çok kurnaz bir adam var. Saat yediye kadar hiçbir şey yapamayız. O saatte sizinle buluşur, çok geçmeden de meseleyi çözeriz.
es: "Debemos ser circunspectos, pues estamos tratando con un hombre muy astuto. No podemos hacer nada hasta las siete. A esa hora estaremos con usted, y no tardaremos en resolver el misterio".
vi_translation: “We must be cautious because we are dealing with an extremely cunning person. From now until 7 o'clock, we can't do anything. At that exact time, we will come to the manor to meet you, and soon we will resolve the issue.”
tr_translation: "We must be cautious, because we are dealing with a very cunning man. We can't do anything until seven o'clock. At that time, we will meet with you, and shortly after, we will resolve the matter."
es_translation: "We must be circumspect, for we are dealing with a very cunning man. We cannot do anything until seven o'clock. At that time we will be with you, and it won't take long to solve the mystery."

en: “Then, pray, sit down, and let us hear it for there are several points on which I must confess that I am still in the dark.”
vi: “Thế thì, xin mời bà ngồi và hãy thuật lại cho chúng tôi nghe vì tôi phải thú nhận là hãy còn vài điểm mà tôi vẫn còn mù mờ.”
tr: "Lütfen oturun ve anlatın, çünkü kafamda hâlâ aydınlanmamış birkaç nokta var.
es: "Entonces, por favor, siéntese y déjenos escucharla porque hay varios puntos en los que debo confesar que aún estoy en la oscuridad".
vi_translation: "Well then, please have a seat and tell us the story because I must admit there are still a few points that remain unclear to me."
tr_translation: "Please sit down and explain, because there are still a few points in my mind that are not clear."
es_translation: "Then, please, sit down and let us listen to you because there are several points on which I must confess that I am still in the dark."
